channel.title: Ansible on Dragons Lair
channel.description: Recent content in Ansible on Dragons Lair

item.title: Ansible roles for the infra!
item.description: As our infrastructure is growing, the number of services and tasks is increasing as well. This can be tedious and time-consuming, especially when you have to deal with a lot of servers - enter Ansible! Ansible allows automating tasks on a wide range of platforms, including Linux, Windows, and Mac. 🔧
